    CustomFacetCreator.mergeFacets(Facet first, Facet second)
    In case such a custom facet should be created on a field that is indexed on variant and master level, two facets are created and should be merged.

    CustomFacetCreator.mergeFacets(Facet first, Facet second)
    In case such a custom facet should be created on a field that is indexed on variant and master level, two facets are created and should be merged.
